Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/27th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/27th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Grace
ShortDescription: SB 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison & Central, due to street blockage near Central/Grace.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison then resume their normal route at Central, due to street blockage near Central/Grace.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
